= Introduction =

WinxGui mailing list is [mailto:winxgui@gmail.com winxgui@gmail.com].
You can post any question to the mailing list. And your questions will be forward to http://groups.google.com/group/winx automatically.


= How to join in? =

How to join in WinxGui mailing list? You can:
  * Join in http://groups.google.com/group/winx, and get messages from it(http://groups.google.com/group/winx/subscribe).
  * Mail to [mailto:xushiweizh@gmail.com xushiweizh@gmail.com] to apply.
